moves.2. f4: The oldest gambit in the book.
moves.3. Nf3: Developing quickly and eliminating any possibility of ... Q-R5 ch.
moves.4. Bc4: Quickly pressuring the K-side. The correct response is 4... B-N2.
moves.4... f6: The losing move. Now White sacrifices to unleash a violent attack.
moves.5... fxg5: Refusing the piece does him no good. May as well die with your boots on.
